column5: Adorable cottage close to everything; just one block to the beach, restaurants and Pleasure Pier. One bedroom has two bunk beds that sleeps four and the other bedroom has a queen bed. There is also a sleeper sofa in the living room that sleeps two. The backyard is fully fenced for BBQ and private get together with friends. The front porch is a great place to sit and have morning coffee while listening to the ocean.
column8: 2 Bedroom Cottage Close to the Beach
